# 优酷 APP 全量支持“暗黑模式” ——设计与技术完整总结

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/youku-app-quanliang-zhichi-anhei-moshi-sheji-yu-jishu-wanzheng-zongjie
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/youku-app-quanliang-zhichi-anhei-moshi-sheji-yu-jishu-wanzheng-zongjie
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install youku-app-quanliang-zhichi-anhei-moshi-sheji-yu-jishu-wanzheng-zongjie
youku-app-quanliang-zhichi-anhei-moshi-sheji-yu-jishu-wanzheng-zongjie <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g youku-app-quanliang-zhichi-anhei-moshi-sheji-yu-jishu-wanzheng-zongjie
youku-app-quanliang-zhichi-anhei-moshi-sheji-yu-jishu-wanzheng-zongjie <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
